citations.narrative:
When the inspector arrived at the physical address listed in the inspection site and application registration for the
registrant, the current tenant said no one by the registrant's name resided at the facility. No communication has been
made by the registrant to USDA APHIS Animal Care to let the agency know of an address change. Failure to provide
change of current address prevents Animal Care from inspecting and assuring adequate animal care and welfare. A
registrant shall notify the Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or
other change in operations affecting its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making
such change.
Correct by March 5, 2024, forward.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm-2:00pm on
05-MAR-2024.
Inspector went to the address provided in the customer's application for registration and was told the registrant did not live
at this address. The number provided by the customer in his application for registration was then called and no response
was obtained. Left voicemail and no respond or call back was obtained.
End Section

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
When the inspector arrived at the physical address listed in the inspection site and application registration for the 
registrant, the current tenant said no one by the registrant's name resided at the facility. No communication has been 
made by the registrant to USDA APHIS Animal Care to let the agency know of an address change. Failure to provide 
change of current address prevents Animal Care from inspecting and assuring adequate animal care and welfare. A 
registrant shall notify the Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or 
other change in operations affecting its status as an exhibitor, carrier, or intermediate handler, within 10 days after making 
such change. 
 
Correct by March 5, 2024, forward. 
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30pm-2:00pm on 
05-MAR-2024. 
Inspector went to the address provided in the customer's application for registration and was told the registrant did not live 
at this address. The number provided by the customer in his application for registration was then called and no response 
was obtained. Left voicemail and no respond or call back was obtained. 
 
 
End Section
